channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Tab K10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Tab K10

item.title: CVE-2024-4786|2024-07-31T12:32:34.253Z -- lenovo -- tab%20k10
item.description: An improper validation vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Tab K10 that could allow a specially crafted application to keep the device on.
